analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Reversal of the Law🔽The Numerical Series of the Conditions

analyzed: sa raṇa duka sa hetuka duka

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Naaraṇaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na saraṇam na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ sa hetukaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  na araṇam na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a non-conflict and a non-cause as condition there arises a conflict and a cause.🔽With a non-conflict and a non-cause as condition there arises a conflict and a cause.

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: dve pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve
translated: (In brief.) With a cause as condition, two … With an antecedent as condition, one … With a nutriment as condition, one … With a faculty as condition, one … With an element as condition, two.

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na saraṇam na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ ahetukaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a non-conflict and a non-cause as condition there arises a conflict and a cause.

original: Naaraṇaṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na araṇam na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ ahetukaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a non-conflict and a non-cause as condition there arises a conflict and a cause.

original: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… sahajāte cattāri …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: hetuyā dve ārammaṇe ekam pe sahajāte cattāri pe vipāke ekam pe avigate cattāri
translated: (In brief.) With a cause as condition, two. With an object as condition, one … With an immediately preceding as condition, four … With a nutriment as condition, one … With a faculty as condition, one … With an element as condition, four.
